column1: Garhshankar is a city in Hoshiarpur district in the state of Punjab
It was founded by Doad king named Shankar Sahai in 1000 AD. Garhshankar was converted as a Tehsil in the year of 1844 by British Govt.

column2: Satnaur Badesron Railway Station are the very nearby railway stations to Garhshankar.

column3: 955. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Garhshankar has an average literacy rate of 73%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 76%
